I<S>1473</S> therefore<S>3767</S>, the prisoner<S>1198</S> of<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, beseech<S>3870</S> you<S>5209</S> that ye walk<S>4043</S> worthy<S>516</S> of the vocation<S>2821</S> wherewith<S>3739</S> ye are called<S>2564</S>, <sup>of the Lord: or, in the Lord</sup>
With<S>3326</S> all<S>3956</S> lowliness<S>5012</S> and<S>2532</S> meekness<S>4236</S>, with<S>3326</S> longsuffering<S>3115</S>, forbearing<S>430</S> one another<S>240</S> in<S>1722</S> love<S>26</S>;
Endeavouring<S>4704</S> to keep<S>5083</S> the unity<S>1775</S> of the Spirit<S>4151</S> in<S>1722</S> the bond<S>4886</S> of peace<S>1515</S>.
There is one<S>1520</S> body<S>4983</S>, and<S>2532</S> one<S>1520</S> Spirit<S>4151</S>, even as<S>2531</S> <S>2532</S> ye are called<S>2564</S> in<S>1722</S> one<S>3391</S> hope<S>1680</S> of your<S>5216</S> calling<S>2821</S>;
One<S>1520</S> Lord<S>2962</S>, one<S>1520</S> faith<S>4102</S>, one<S>3391</S> baptism<S>908</S>,
One<S>1520</S> God<S>2316</S> and<S>2532</S> Father<S>3962</S> of all<S>3956</S>, who<S>3588</S> is above<S>1909</S> all<S>3956</S>, and<S>2532</S> through<S>1223</S> all<S>3956</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S> all<S>3956</S>.
But<S>1161</S> unto every<S>1538</S> one<S>1520</S> of us<S>2257</S> is given<S>1325</S> grace<S>5485</S> according to<S>2596</S> the measure<S>3358</S> of the gift<S>1431</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>.
Wherefore<S>1352</S> he saith<S>3004</S>, When he ascended<S>305</S> up<S>1519</S> on high<S>5311</S>, he led captivity<S>162</S> captive<S>161</S>, and<S>2532</S> gave<S>1325</S> gifts<S>1390</S> unto men<S>444</S>. <sup>captivity: or, a multitude of captives</sup>
(Now<S>1161</S> that he ascended<S>305</S>, what<S>5101</S> is it<S>2076</S> but<S>1508</S> that<S>3754</S> he<S>2597</S> also<S>2532</S> descended<S>2597</S> first<S>4412</S> into<S>1519</S> the lower<S>2737</S> parts<S>3313</S> of the earth<S>1093</S>?
He<S>846</S> that descended<S>2597</S> is<S>2076</S> the same also<S>2532</S> that ascended up<S>305</S> far above<S>5231</S> all<S>3956</S> heavens<S>3772</S>, that<S>2443</S> he might fill<S>4137</S> all things<S>3956</S>.) <sup>fill: or, fulfil</sup>
And<S>2532</S> he<S>846</S> gave<S>1325</S> some<S>3303</S>, apostles<S>652</S>; and<S>1161</S> some, prophets<S>4396</S>; and<S>1161</S> some, evangelists<S>2099</S>; and<S>1161</S> some, pastors<S>4166</S> and<S>2532</S> teachers<S>1320</S>;
For<S>4314</S> the perfecting<S>2677</S> of the saints<S>40</S>, for<S>1519</S> the work<S>2041</S> of the ministry<S>1248</S>, for<S>1519</S> the edifying<S>3619</S> of the body<S>4983</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>:
Till<S>3360</S> we all<S>3956</S> come<S>2658</S> in<S>1519</S> the unity<S>1775</S> of the faith<S>4102</S>, and<S>2532</S> of the knowledge<S>1922</S> of the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>, unto<S>1519</S> a perfect<S>5046</S> man<S>435</S>, unto<S>1519</S> the measure<S>3358</S> of the stature<S>2244</S> of the fulness<S>4138</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>: <sup>in: or, into</sup> <sup>stature: or, age</sup>
That<S>2443</S> we henceforth be<S>5600</S> no more<S>3371</S> children<S>3516</S>, tossed to and fro<S>2831</S>, and<S>2532</S> carried about with<S>4064</S> every<S>3956</S> wind<S>417</S> of doctrine<S>1319</S>, by<S>1722</S> the sleight<S>2940</S> of men<S>444</S>, and cunning craftiness<S>1722</S> <S>3834</S>, whereby<S>4314</S> they lie in wait<S>3180</S> to deceive<S>4106</S>;
But<S>1161</S> speaking the truth<S>226</S> in<S>1722</S> love<S>26</S>, may grow up<S>837</S> into<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S> in all things<S>3956</S>, which<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S> the head<S>2776</S>, even Christ<S>5547</S>: <sup>speaking: or, being sincere</sup>
From<S>1537</S> whom<S>3739</S> the whole<S>3956</S> body<S>4983</S> fitly joined together<S>4883</S> and<S>2532</S> compacted<S>4822</S> by<S>1223</S> that which every<S>3956</S> joint<S>860</S> supplieth<S>2024</S>, according<S>2596</S> to the effectual working<S>1753</S> in<S>1722</S> the measure<S>3358</S> of every<S>1538</S> part<S>1520</S> <S>3313</S>, maketh<S>4160</S> increase<S>838</S> of the body<S>4983</S> unto<S>1519</S> the edifying<S>3619</S> of itself<S>1438</S> in<S>1722</S> love<S>26</S>.
This<S>5124</S> I say<S>3004</S> therefore<S>3767</S>, and<S>2532</S> testify<S>3143</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, that ye<S>5209</S> henceforth<S>3371</S> walk<S>4043</S> not<S>3371</S> as<S>2531</S> <S>2532</S> other<S>3062</S> Gentiles<S>1484</S> walk<S>4043</S>, in<S>1722</S> the vanity<S>3153</S> of their<S>846</S> mind<S>3563</S>,
Having the understanding<S>1271</S> darkened<S>4654</S>, being<S>5607</S> alienated<S>526</S> from the life<S>2222</S> of God<S>2316</S> through<S>1223</S> the ignorance<S>52</S> that is<S>5607</S> in<S>1722</S> them<S>846</S>, because<S>1223</S> of the blindness<S>4457</S> of their<S>846</S> heart<S>2588</S>: <sup>blindness: or, hardness</sup>
Who<S>3748</S> being past feeling<S>524</S> have given<S>3860</S> themselves<S>1438</S> over<S>3860</S> unto lasciviousness<S>766</S>, to<S>1519</S> work<S>2039</S> all<S>3956</S> uncleanness<S>167</S> with<S>1722</S> greediness<S>4124</S>.
But<S>1161</S> ye<S>5210</S> have<S>3129</S> not<S>3756</S> so<S>3779</S> learned<S>3129</S> Christ<S>5547</S>;
If so be that<S>1489</S> ye have heard<S>191</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> have been taught<S>1321</S> by<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>, as<S>2531</S> the truth<S>225</S> is<S>2076</S> in<S>1722</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>:
That ye<S>5209</S> put off<S>659</S> concerning<S>2596</S> the former<S>4387</S> conversation<S>391</S> the old<S>3820</S> man<S>444</S>, which<S>3588</S> is corrupt<S>5351</S> according<S>2596</S> to the deceitful<S>539</S> lusts<S>1939</S>;
And<S>1161</S> be renewed<S>365</S> in the spirit<S>4151</S> of your<S>5216</S> mind<S>3563</S>;
And<S>2532</S> that ye put on<S>1746</S> the new<S>2537</S> man<S>444</S>, which<S>3588</S> after<S>2596</S> God<S>2316</S> is created<S>2936</S> in<S>1722</S> righteousness<S>1343</S> and<S>2532</S> true<S>225</S> holiness<S>3742</S>. <sup>true: or, holiness of truth</sup>
Wherefore<S>1352</S> putting away<S>659</S> lying<S>5579</S>, speak<S>2980</S> every man<S>1538</S> truth<S>225</S> with<S>3326</S> his<S>846</S> neighbour<S>4139</S>: for<S>3754</S> we are<S>2070</S> members<S>3196</S> one of another<S>240</S>.
Be ye angry<S>3710</S>, and<S>2532</S> sin<S>264</S> not<S>3361</S>: let<S>1931</S> not<S>3361</S> the sun<S>2246</S> go down<S>1931</S> upon<S>1909</S> your<S>5216</S> wrath<S>3950</S>:
Neither<S>3383</S> give<S>1325</S> place<S>5117</S> to the devil<S>1228</S>.
Let<S>2813</S> him that stole<S>2813</S> steal<S>2813</S> no more<S>3371</S>: but<S>1161</S> rather<S>3123</S> let him labour<S>2872</S>, working<S>2038</S> with his hands<S>5495</S> the thing which is good<S>18</S>, that<S>2443</S> he may have<S>2192</S> to give<S>3330</S> to him that needeth<S>5532</S> <S>2192</S>. <sup>to give: or, to distribute</sup>
Let<S>4550</S> no<S>3361</S> <S>3956</S> corrupt<S>4550</S> communication<S>3056</S> proceed<S>1607</S> out of<S>1537</S> your<S>5216</S> mouth<S>4750</S>, but<S>235</S> that which<S>1536</S> is good<S>18</S> to<S>4314</S> the use<S>5532</S> of edifying<S>3619</S>, that<S>2443</S> it may minister<S>1325</S> grace<S>5485</S> unto the hearers<S>191</S>. <sup>to: or, to edify profitably</sup>
And<S>2532</S> grieve<S>3076</S> not<S>3361</S> the holy<S>40</S> Spirit<S>4151</S> of God<S>2316</S>, whereby<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> ye are sealed<S>4972</S> unto<S>1519</S> the day<S>2250</S> of redemption<S>629</S>.
Let<S>142</S> all<S>3956</S> bitterness<S>4088</S>, and<S>2532</S> wrath<S>2372</S>, and<S>2532</S> anger<S>3709</S>, and<S>2532</S> clamour<S>2906</S>, and<S>2532</S> evil speaking<S>988</S>, be put away<S>142</S> from<S>575</S> you<S>5216</S>, with<S>4862</S> all<S>3956</S> malice<S>2549</S>:
And<S>1161</S> be<S>1096</S> ye kind<S>5543</S> one to another<S>1519</S> <S>240</S>, tenderhearted<S>2155</S>, forgiving<S>5483</S> one another<S>1438</S>, even as<S>2531</S> <S>2532</S> God<S>2316</S> for<S>1722</S> Christ's<S>5547</S> sake<S>1722</S> hath forgiven<S>5483</S> you<S>5213</S>.
